item.title: Trump's 'most magnificent poles' with U.S. flags to debut at White House
item.description: President Trump said Wednesday the White House will raise American flags on two poles he had planted as a personal gift to the nation.

item.title: Los Angeles mayor lifts downtown curfew she imposed during protests against immigration raids
item.description: Downtown Los Angeles businesses hoped customers would return quickly on Tuesday after Mayor Karen Bass lifted a curfew she had imposed last week to pr...

item.title: Kristi Noem is 'alert and recovering' after trip to hospital over allergic reaction, official says
item.description: U.S. Secretary of Homeland Security Kristi Noem was taken to the hospital on Tuesday after experiencing an allergic reaction, her spokeswoman said.

item.title: Trump's pledge not to plunge U.S. into war questioned over his support for Israel's strikes on Iran
